model

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    A specific cell in a binary puzzle with a boolean locked and an enumeration to keep track of its contents. It provides several methods to manage it's contents.
    Since:
    Sunday February 24

      Constructors

      Cell(boolean locked, CellValue value)
      Default constructor.

              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Set the value of the cell
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when precondition violated.
